Can treat multiple lesion , measure 2.5-3.5mm ( visual estimate ) . Patients enrol randomized 1:2 propose one group without stent coating , respectively . DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥18 year ≤75 year ; 2 . Symptomatic cardiac ischemic disease and/or document evidence myocardial ischemia ; 3 . Types B1 B2 coronary lesion ( accord ACC/AHA classification modify Ellis ) ; 4 . Target lesion locate native coronary artery ; 5 . Target lesion vessel diameter range 2.5 3.5 mm ( visual estimate ) amenable treatment ( coverage ) 16 19mmlong stent ; 6 . Target lesion > 50 % diameter stenosis ( visual estimate ) ; 7 . Acceptable candidate myocardial revascularization surgery ( coronary artery bypass graft surgery ) ; 8 . The subject fully inform nature study , willing comply study requirement provide write informed consent approve Ethics Committee respective clinical site . 1 . Female patient childbearing potential ; 2 . Recent Qwave myocardial infarction occur within 48 hour prior index procedure . Recent Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction still elevate level cardiac marker ; 3 . Documented leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % ; 4 . Renal dysfunction ( creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL 177 µmol/L ) ; 5 . Platelet count < 100,000 cells/mm³ > 700,000 cells/mm³ . ; 6 . White blood cell count < 3,000 cells/mm3 ; 7 . Suspected documented hepatic disease ( include laboratorial evidence hepatitis ) ; 8 . Heart transplant receptor ; 9 . Known hypersensitivity cobaltchromium medication aspirin , clopidogrel bisulfate ( Plavix ISCOVER ) , ticlopidine ( Ticlid ) heparin . 10 .
